name: H4X0R
description:
H4X0R has you playing as a newly hired cybersecurity engineer, who encounters a hacktivist group and joins them on their travels to bring down a corrupt conglomerate.

Notes

As the game is not finished the download is a demo version containing a fully functioning environment, but only one-story mission.

Features:

  • Usable Linux terminal with multiple different commands
  • Hidden easter eggs around the office allowing cool features to be discovered
  • A cool soundtrack composed by AI

A full write up of how the game was made is available here.
